question: The "Adelie Land" on Antarctica is under the administration of which country?
explanation: Adelie Land is a claimed territory on the continent of Antarctica. It stretches from a portion of the Southern Ocean coastline all the way inland to the South Pole. France has administrated it as one of five districts of the French Southern and Antarctic Lands since 1955 and applied the Antarctic Treaty System rule since 1961. It has the status of French Overseas territory.
